What causes Jones syndrome ?,"What causes Jones syndrome? The exact, underlying genetic cause of Jones syndrome is not yet known.",GARD,Jones syndrome
Is Jones syndrome inherited ?,"How is Jones syndrome inherited? Jones syndrome is inherited in an autosomal dominant manner. This means that having only one changed (mutated) copy of the responsible gene in each cell is enough to cause signs or symptoms of the condition.
